Uses of Package
jakarta.xml.bind.annotation

Packages that use jakarta.xml.bind.annotation
Package
Description
jakarta.xml.bind.annotation
Defines annotations for customizing Java program elements to XML Schema mapping.
jakarta.xml.ws
This package contains the core Jakarta XML Web Services APIs.
jakarta.xml.ws.wsaddressing
 
  • Classes in jakarta.xml.bind.annotation used by jakarta.xml.bind.annotation
    Class
    Description
    DomHandler
    Converts an element (and its descendants) from/to DOM (or similar) representation.
    XmlAccessOrder
    Used by XmlAccessorOrder to control the ordering of properties and fields in a Jakarta XML Binding bound class.
    XmlAccessType
    Used by XmlAccessorType to control serialization of fields or properties.
    XmlNsForm
    Enumeration of XML Schema namespace qualifications.
  • Classes in jakarta.xml.bind.annotation used by jakarta.xml.ws
    Class
    Description
    XmlTransient
    Prevents the mapping of a JavaBean property/type to XML representation.
  • Classes in jakarta.xml.bind.annotation used by jakarta.xml.ws.wsaddressing
    Class
    Description
    XmlRootElement
    Maps a class or an enum type to an XML element.
    XmlType
    Maps a class or an enum type to a XML Schema type.
